quote: Automated machine learning (AutoML) seeks to build ML models with minimal human effort.

the design of tailored hyperparameters and identifying neural networks for training in a fully automatic fashion without human intervention, which is referred to as automated ML (AutoML), has yielded great achievements.
OmniForce follows the model-as-a-service (MaaS) pattern and fully connects the search, training, inference, and deployment processes.
HAML pays attention to the whole ML pipeline, where one needs to consider data collection; updating the data version, feature pipelines, algorithms, and search spaces.
The search engine is implemented via a search strategy framework with multiobjective collaboration, which attaches to a semisynchronized controller.
The job estimator is a semisynchronized controller of the AutoML process that determines which tasks should be evaluated next, how to handle their rewards, and when to start the next iteration.
OmniForce builds an AutoML system with widely provisioned ML algorithms and uniform interfaces for crowdsourcing algorithms, models, and search spaces.
OmniForce develops a task sidecar service accompanied by the TTE to proxy the communication process.
The OmniForce advisor visualizes the search process during task execution.
The task sidecar bridges the candidates reserved by the workers and instantiates them to cloud-native workloads such as jobs and PytorchJobs to conduct an evaluation.
The manager converts the resource pipeline into a standard format supported by the Kubeflow pipeline controller and starts the pipeline components in logical order.
The core idea of model management is to realize automatic model iteration with a closed loop of training, deployment, monitoring, and optimization.
Its local interpretation characteristics facilitate the interpretation of a single sample predicted by the model and help users intuitively understand the interpretation process.
Model robustness is the ability to resist external disturbances, which is a prerequisite for widely using AI.
OmniForce organizes the entire process from training to deployment through an automated pipeline.
